sections.text: 55.602 Definitions.—As used in this act, the term:

sections.heading: Applicability
sections.text: 55.603 Applicability.—This act applies to any out-of-country foreign judgment that is final and conclusive and enforceable where rendered, even though an appeal therefrom is pending or is subject to appeal.

55.501-55.509 may be cited as the “Florida Enforcement of Foreign Judgments Act.”
sections.text: 55.501-55.509 may be cited as the “Florida Enforcement of Foreign Judgments Act.”

sections.heading: Definitions. As used in this act, the term:(1)“Foreign state” means any governmental unit other than the United States, or any state, district, commonwealth, territory, insular possession thereof, or the Panama Canal Zone, the Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands, or the Ryukyu Islands
Applicability. This act applies to any out-of-country foreign judgment that is final and conclusive and enforceable where rendered, even though an appeal therefrom is pending or is subject to appeal
